Tweaks.name: Tweaked Gravel
Tweaks.description: Changes the Gravel texture to make it grainier.

Tweaks.name: Desaturated Dark Oak
Tweaks.description:
Desaturates all Dark Oak related textures.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

overrideslave{Desaturated Dark Oak Complete Pack}

Tweaks.name: Curracabah Acacia
Tweaks.description:
Changes all Acacia related textures.

requiresefr

inspiration{[Os' Curracabah Acacia](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/os-curracabah-acacia/)}

overrideslave{Curracabah Acacia Complete Pack}

Tweaks.name: Brown Podzol
Tweaks.description: Changes the Podzol texture to remove the greenish specs in it.

Tweaks.name: Programmer Art Colored Melon
Tweaks.description: Changes the Melon textures to the Programmer Art Color Palette. Also adds a colored stem.

Tweaks.name: Faceless Pumpkins
Tweaks.description: Exchanges the Pumpkin's face texture with its side texture to rid the standard Pumpkins of their faces.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Horse Armor
Tweaks.description: Changes the Iron and Diamond Horse Armor to be consistent with their item versions. Iron Horse Armor will get a black saddle and Diamond Horse Armor will get a blue saddle.

Tweaks.name: Blinking Ender Eye
Tweaks.description: Gives the Ender Eye an animation that has it blinking from time to time.

Tweaks.name: Mixed Hurt Sounds
Tweaks.description:
Mixes the Hurting sounds for the player with the old Beta sound so that they play at the same time when a player gets hurt. This also applies to the new specific Hurting sounds that play when the player is hurt by Sweet Berry Bushes, Drowning or Fire.

requiresefr

⚠️ Careful: Some mods assign the standard player Hurting sound to mobs. Using this Addon will give them the classic Hurting sound aswell, so keep that in mind.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Wheat
Tweaks.description: Makes the Wheat texture consistent with the color palette of Hay Bales.

Tweaks.name: Useful Chainmail
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of all Chainmail pieces so that they look a little more tangible.

requiresefr

attscript

Tweaks.name: Equalized Cake
Tweaks.description:
Removes the central cherry from the Cake top texture and item texture.

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Consistent Helmets
Tweaks.description:
Provides a noseguard in the item textures of Iron Helmets, Gold Helmets and Diamond Helmets.

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Blinking Observers
Tweaks.description:
Gives the Observer face an animation that has it blinking and shifting eyes from time to time.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Blooming Cactus
Tweaks.description:
Adds blooming blossoms to the side and top of the Cactus texture.

incompat{Cactus Complete Pack}

Tweaks.name: Unlit Redstone Ore
Tweaks.description:
Adds an unlit variant to Redstone Ore and Deepslate Redstone Ore. Also adds a Deepslate Ore top texture.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

incompat{Deepslate Ore Top Textures}

Tweaks.name: Saturated Mossy Stone
Tweaks.description:
Saturates the moss in Mossy Cobblestone and Mossy Stone Bricks and their respective Slabs, Stairs and Walls, when they are placed in wet biomes.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Beta Cow Sounds
Tweaks.description:
Changes all sounds Cows make into those of Minecraft Beta.

⚠️ Careful: Should a mod add another type of cow that utilizes vanilla cows as a basis, they will also emit the sounds from this Addon.

Tweaks.name: Bedrock Nether Bricks
Tweaks.description:
Changes the Nether Bricks textures to a lighter shade, like in Bedrock Edition. Also applies to Cracked Nether Bricks and Chiseled Nether Bricks, aswell as Nether Brick Fences, Nether Brick Walls, Nether Brick Stairs and Nether Brick Slabs.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Double-wide Hay Bale Rims
Tweaks.description: Changes the side texture of Hay Bales to give the rims a double-wide appearance.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Iron Nugget
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of the Iron Nugget, to fit the lineart of the Gold Nugget and the color palette of the Iron Ingot.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Programmer Art Rabbit
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of the Raw Rabbit and Cooked Rabbit, to fit the lineart of their Programmer Art versions, with the color palette of the Jappa versions.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Black Granite
Tweaks.description:
Changes the Granite texture to turn it into deep black with white specs.

requiresefr

inspiration{[Redrooey](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/black-granite/)}

Tweaks.name: Biome-specific Monster Spawners
Tweaks.description: Changes the textures of the Monster Spawners to give it a dedicated top and bottom texture, aswell as some biome-specific textures.

Tweaks.name: Pebble-free Dirt
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of all dirt variations so that they have no pebbles in them.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Gold-speckled Lapis Lazuli
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of Lapis Lazuli, Lapis Lazuli Ore, Lapis Lazuli Block and Deepslate Lapis Lazuli Ore to feature tiny golden specs, like they're found in real Lapis Lazuli. Also adds a Deepslate Ore top texture.

requiresefr

inspiration{[Sr_Paulo](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/better-lapis-lazuli/)}

incompat{Deepslate Ore Top Textures}

#78B159{Attached is a mod that makes Lapis Lazuli Ore occasionally drop Gold Nuggets.}

Tweaks.name: Illager Witch
Tweaks.description: Changes the color scheme of the Witch to be more in line with how the Illagers from the Village & Pillage Update look.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Leather
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of Leather, Saddles, Item Frames (both in item and entity/block form) and Books to have the color palette of Leather Armor.

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Desert Shulkers
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures for Shulkers when placed in Desert or Mesa biomes. The texture is a palette swap of the __Fixed Shulkers Addon__, that uses the color palette of Red Sandstone.

requiresefr

inspiration{[Whimzee](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8qKTXf_-obk)}

Tweaks.name: Netherite-colored Ancient Debris
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures for Ancient Debris and Ancient Scrap to use the color palette of Netherite.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Faded Classic Command Block
Tweaks.description: Changes the texture of the old Command Block to be faded with lowly blinking lights. It is recommended to only use this Addon in conjunction with [Future Commands](https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding-java-edition/minecraft-mods/2888753-moved-to-a-new-website-future-commands-v1-3). Also renames the Command Block to 'Classic Command Block'.

Tweaks.name: Programmer Art Rabbit's Foot
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of the Rabbit's Foot, to fit the lineart of its Programmer Art version, with the color palette of the Jappa version.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Vintage Cherry
Tweaks.description:
Changes all Cherry related textures to be darker. Also changes Pink Petals and the Petal particles emitted from Cherry Leaves.

requiresefr

inspiration{[Rediscovered](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/rediscovered)}

overrideslave{Vintage Cherry Complete Pack}

Tweaks.name: Darker Mangrove
Tweaks.description:
Changes all Mangrove related textures to be darker.

requiresefr

overrideslave{Darker Mangrove Complete Pack}

Tweaks.name: Red Crimson
Tweaks.description:
Changes all Crimson related textures to be red.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

overrideslave{Red Crimson Complete Pack}

Tweaks.name: Shifting Prismarine Bricks
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of the Prismarine Bricks to slowly shift color to match Prismarine.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Consistent Bamboo
Tweaks.description:
Changes Bamboo Planks, Bamboo Mosaic and Bamboo Signs to be consistent with other wood types.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

overrideslave{Consistent Bamboo Complete Pack}

Tweaks.name: Blooming Moss
Tweaks.description:
Changes Moss Blocks and Carpets to randomly have Azalea-style blossoms on them.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Written Note
Tweaks.description: Changes Written Books whose titles include 'Note' in any way to appear as a Paper with scribbles on it. Additionally, when titled 'Crumpled Note', it'll appear as crumpled and when titled 'Ripped Note' appears as a ripped piece of paper.

Tweaks.name: Stacking Arrows
Tweaks.description:
Changes Arrows so that they display different textures when they are stacked.

#78B159{Attached is an additional file that makes the Quiver textures consistent with __Consistent Leather__.}

Tweaks.name: Blank Name Tag
Tweaks.description: Changes Name Tags so that they appear blank until they're named. Then they appear written. When the Name Tag is named 'Dinnerbone' or 'Grumm', it will look like it's upside-down, when it's named 'jeb_', it will cycle through the wool colors, when it's named 'Toast', it will display the Toast rabbit coloring and when it's named 'Johnny', it will look like it's been slashed and battered.

Tweaks.name: Desaturated Purpur
Tweaks.description:
Changes all Purpur Block textures to be slightly desaturated. Also applies to the pink part of the End Rod.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Darker Dark Oak Leaves
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of Dark Oak Leaves to be slightly darker than the normal Oak Leaves counterpart.

inspirationvt

overridemaster{Better Opaque Leaves}

Tweaks.name: Magical Mushrooms
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of the Mushrooms blocks, to take on a purple (in case of Brown Mushroom) and pink (in case of Red Mushroom) shade, when placed in Roofed Forests. or Thaumcraft's Magical Forest. Also includes the rotational properties of the Rotated Mushrooms Addon.

inspiration{[Os' Mystical Mushrooms](https://modrinth.com/resourcepack/os-mystical-mushrooms)}

overridemaster{Rotated Mushrooms}

Tweaks.name: Muted Warped Wood
Tweaks.description:
Changes all Warped related textures to be more smooth and less contrast-y.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

overrideslave{Muted Warped Wood Complete Pack}

Tweaks.name: Lower Sides
Tweaks.description:
Changes the side textures of Grass, Podzol, Mycelium, Grass Paths and Crimson and Warped Nylium to be lowered.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

incompat{Full Sides}

#78B159{Attached is an additional file that includes a lower side texture for __Brown Podzol__.}

Tweaks.name: Full Sides
Tweaks.description:
Changes the side textures of Grass, Podzol, Mycelium, Grass Paths and Crimson and Warped Nylium to be full, like the top textures.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

incompat{Lower Sides}

#78B159{Attached is an additional file that includes a full side texture for __Brown Podzol__.}

Tweaks.name: Uniform Ores
Tweaks.description:
Changes the Ore textures to be uniform versions of their pre-Jappa configuration.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

incompat{Lower Sides}

#78B159{Attached are two additional files that include uniform versions of __Gold-speckled Lapis Lazuli__ and __Unlit Redstone__.}

Tweaks.name: Clean Redstone
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of placed-down Redstone Dust to be cleaner and less frizzy.

inspirationvt
